mapper.select: SELECT customer_id value, CONCAT(first_name,' ',last_name) title FROM customers WHERE deleted_at IS NULL;
SELECT delivery_address_id value, address_name title FROM delivery_addresses WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND customer_id=#{customerId};

SELECT wt.warehouse_detail_id warehouseDetailId, p.product_name productName, p.price, p.discount FROM warehouse_details wt LEFT JOIN products p ON p.product_id= wt.product_id WHERE wt.deleted_at IS NULL AND wt.stock>0 AND warehouse_id= (SELECT w.warehouse_id FROM warehouses w WHERE w.region_id=(SELECT region_id FROM delivery_addresses WHERE delivery_address_id=#{addressId}) AND w.deleted_at IS NULL LIMIT 1);
